com.coasttocoastresearch.apg
Class Utilities.XMLWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.coasttocoastresearch.apg.Utilities.XMLWriter
Enclosing class:
Utilities
public static class Utilities.XMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object

A class for assisting in the writing of XML files. This is an assistant only. Generating a complete and valid XML file is the user's responsibility.

Constructor Summary

Method Detail

declaration

public void declaration()
Generates the XML declaration. Version 1.0, UTF-8 encoding only.

endTag

public void endTag(int indent,
                   java.lang.String name)
Generates an end tag.

Parameters:
indent - the number of spaces to indent before printing the line.
name - tag name

setOut

public void setOut(java.io.PrintStream out)
Sets the output device

Parameters:
out - the output device.

startTag

public void startTag(int indent,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String[] attrs)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Generates a start tag.

Parameters:
indent - the number of spaces to indent before printing the line.
name - tag name
attrs - the attributes as name/value pairs of Strings. May be null or an array of zero length if no attributes are to be included in the start tag.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - thrown if the non-null or non-empty array of attributes does not have an even number of members (name/value pairs)

textTag

public void textTag(int indent,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String[] attrs,
                    java.lang.String text)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Generates a start and end tag pair with text between them.

Parameters:
indent - the number of spaces to indent before printing the line.
name - tag name
attrs - the attributes as name/value pairs of Strings. May be null or an array of zero length if no attributes are to be included in the start tag.
text - the text to include between the start and end tags.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - thrown if the non-null or non-empty array of attributes does not have an even number of members (name/value pairs)
